about_the_game:
Show your team that you're above the rank and file with this set of Customization options that put you a cut above regular infantry.

Features items for both the Northern and Southern forces.

  • Officer Uniform- PAVN
  • Cavalry Ascot - US Army
  • Officer's Cap - PAVN
  • Beret - US Army
  • Campaign Hat - USMC
  • Cigar - PAVN, NLF, US Army
detailed_description:
Show your team that you're above the rank and file with this set of Customization options that put you a cut above regular infantry.

Features items for both the Northern and Southern forces.

  • Officer Uniform- PAVN
  • Cavalry Ascot - US Army
  • Officer's Cap - PAVN
  • Beret - US Army
  • Campaign Hat - USMC
  • Cigar - PAVN, NLF, US Army

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @ 2.5GHz or AMD Phenom @ 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or ATI Radeon HD 5850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: UNSUPPORTED HARDWARE: 32-bit Operating Systems
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
